author: Marie Brewis
title: Galaxy Note 8 UK release date rumours | Note 8 specification rumours
text: Galaxy Note 8 UK release date rumours | Note 8 specification rumours: When is the Samsung Galaxy Note 8 coming out? Note 8 could face tough competition from its own camp Galaxy Note 8 UK release date rumours | Note 8 specification rumours The Note 7 has caused major headaches for Samsung. Now discontinued, fans are looking forward to the Note 8, which has not been dropped by Samsung. We investigate when is the Note 8 coming out: Galaxy Note 8 UK release date and specification rumours. With the last one exploding we need a new Galaxy Note to look forward to - Galaxy Note 8 rumours
